description:
In this video I discuss how Justice AV Solutions software (JAVS) was backdoored in a supply chain attack, and the dangers of public systems like the courts relying on proprietary software.

Read rapid7s report here
https://www.rapid7.com/blog/post/2024/05/23/cve-2024-4978-backdoored-justice-av-solutions-viewer-software-used-in-apparent-supply-chain-attack/

My merch is available at
https://based.win/

Subscribe to me on Odysee.com
https://odysee.com/@AlphaNerd:8

title: Hackers Backdoor Courtroom Video Conference Software
